trans-unit.source: Represents a content anchor or cargo resource for an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.

<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource> elements are used to model <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> (the data that is being annotated) and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> (the data provided by the user such as a text note) in an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>.

Through the use of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A> an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource> can refer to the content, directly contain the content, or both.
This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
id is equal to Guid.Empty.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> class with a specified name.
The `name` parameter is provided for convenience only and no validation is performed on the string.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor automatically creates a unique [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] that is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Id%2A> property.

A name to identify this resource from other <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos"></xref> defined in the same annotation.
name is `null`.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref> elements contained in this resource.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A> property will never return `null`, however the collection may be empty if the resource contains no content locators.
The collection of content locators contained in this resource.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Contents%2A> never returns `null`; however the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> collection may be empty if the resource contains no content.
The collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
Always returns `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
Always `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of this resource.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
Gets or sets a name for this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.

The name assigned to this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to distinguish it from other <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos"></xref> in the annotation.
Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The XML reader to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from.
reader is `null`.
The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> is not valid.
Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The XML writer to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.
writer is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType"></xref> is not valid.
